customer_ticket_id: ticket identifier in which customer concern has been captured
highest_service: highest service taken by the seller
bl_active_days: days for which seller consumed buylead in previous month since the month ticket was opened i.e Oct '25
lms_active_days: days for which seller was actively using lead manager in previous month since the month ticket was opened
pns_calls_recd: pns calls made by the buyer to the seller
inbound_call_answered: call answered by executive when seller called on 9696
call_attempt: call attempt by executive to seller
call_connect: call connected between executive and seller
call_connect_gt5min: call connected between executive and seller with more than 5 min conversation
video_meet: verified video meeting between executive and seller
meeting: physical meeting between executive and seller
meet_gt20min: physical meeting between executive and seller with more than 20 min duration
deleted_products: count of products deleted in prev month since the month ticket was opened i.e Oct '25
modified_products: count of products modified in prev month since the month ticket was opened
prd_added: count of products modified in prev month since the month ticket was opened
live_prd_cnt_open: count of products live on seller catalog before ticket was opened
live_prd_cnt_close: count of products live on seller catalog after ticket was closed
a_rank_mcats_open: a rank mcats of seller when ticket was opened
a_rank_mcats_close: a rank mcats of seller when ticket was closed
d_rank_mcats_open: d rank mcats of seller when ticket was opened
d_rank_mcats_close: d rank mcats of seller when ticket was closed
category_count_open: count of mcats of seller when ticket was opened
category_count_close: count of mcats of seller when ticket was closed
total_bl: bl consumed in previous month since the month in which ticket was opened i.e Oct '25
hyperlocal_bl: bl consumed in previous month since the month in which ticket was opened i.e Oct '25
local_bl: bl consumed in previous month since the month in which ticket was opened i.e Oct '25
customer_ticket_status: If ticket is wip or closed
tat: days taken to close the ticket
appendum_count: count of customer calling for issues since ticket is already wip
source_name: source from where customer raised the concern - 9696, Email, Help, App etc
reason: reason of facing the issue by the seller
feedback_source: Channel (Email or App) through which seller submitted feedback for ticket.
customer_satisfaction: Yes (positive) or No (negative) feedback given by the seller on the ticket closure
ticket_closedby_emp_id: Details of employee who has closed the ticket
emp_name: Details of employee who has closed the ticket
emp_grade: Details of employee who has closed the ticket
iil_func_area_name: Details of employee who has closed the ticket
is_priority_ticket: flag=2 means this ticket was escalated to L2 manager. flag=Blank/Null means not escalated.
ticket_assigne_id: executive to whom ticket has been assigned
ticket_assigne_name: executive to whom ticket has been assigned
tele_l1_id: employee hierarchy of tele assignee of STS
tele_l1_name: employee hierarchy of tele assignee of STS
tele_l2_id: employee hierarchy of tele assignee of STS
tele_l2_name: employee hierarchy of tele assignee of STS
tele_l3_id: employee hierarchy of tele assignee of STS
tele_l3_name: employee hierarchy of tele assignee of STS
tele_l4_id: employee hierarchy of tele assignee of STS
tele_l4_name: employee hierarchy of tele assignee of STS
sales_l1_id: employee hierarchy of sales assignee of STS
sales_l1_name: employee hierarchy of sales assignee of STS
sales_l2_id: employee hierarchy of sales assignee of STS
sales_l2_name: employee hierarchy of sales assignee of STS
sales_l3_id: employee hierarchy of sales assignee of STS
sales_l3_name: employee hierarchy of sales assignee of STS
sales_l4_id: employee hierarchy of sales assignee of STS
sales_l4_name: employee hierarchy of sales assignee of STS
sales_l5_id: employee hierarchy of sales assignee of STS
sales_l5_name: employee hierarchy of sales assignee of STS
repeat30d: flag to know if the ticket is a repeat ticket in last 30 days from the same customer
repeat60d: flag to know if the ticket is a repeat ticket in last 60 days from the same customer
is_ticket_by_sts_owner: flag to identify self ticket which are opened by a process and not due to a customer call
feedback_date: date of submitting feedback by customer for the ticket resolution after ticket closure
old_tele: employee to whom customer was assigned before current assignee
old_sale: employee to whom customer was assigned before current assignee
old_tele_name: employee to whom customer was assigned before current assignee
old_sale_name: employee to whom customer was assigned before current assignee
fk_group_id: group id to differentiate tickets into Sales & Service, Legal and Operations
is_irate_complaint: flag to know if customer is irated
rm_name: Employee Name of Current relationship mgr
ch_name: Employee Name of Current cluster head
zm_name: Employee Name of Current zonal mgr
rd_name: Employee Name of Current regional director
first_call_attempt: Timestamp of first outbound call attempt made by IM employe to the customer (Attempt=Yes, if call was either Answered or Not Answered
first_call_connect: Timestamp of first outbound call connect done by IM employe to the customer. Connect=Yes, if call was Answered by customer
first_call_attempt_frm_tkts: Duration between ticket issuance and first outbound call attempt in xD yM zH format (for example: 0D 2H 27M means after 2hr 27min)
first_call_connect_frm_tkts: Duration between ticket issuance and first outbound call connect in xD yM zH format (for example: 1D 4H 56M)
first_call_attempt_bucket: bucket of call attempt TAT (<15min, 16 to 60 min, 61 min - 2hr, 2 to 4hr, 4+ to 24hr (i.e same day), 1-2 day, 2-3d, 3d+)
first_call_connect_bucket: bucket of call connect TAT (<15min, 16 to 60 min, 61 min - 2hr, 2 to 4hr, 4+ to 24hr (i.e same day), 1-2 day, 2-3d, 3d+)
l2_plus_connect: flag=Y/N if any customer connect (on call or meet) was done by L2 or above employee after ticket issuance
custtype_name: custtype of Glid (Catalog, Star, Leader etc)
bm: Current Business Manager (L3 Emp_Id from Sales Hierarchy of glid)
sm: Current Sales Manager (L2 Emp_Id from Sales Hierarchy of glid)
fsf_l1: Current L1 Emp_Id from Sales Hierarchy of glid
ccm: Current L3 Emp_Id from Tele Hierarchy of glid
cc_l2: Current L2 Emp_Id from Tele Hierarchy of glid
cc_l1: Current L1 Emp_Id from Tele Hierarchy of glid
repeat7d: flag to know if the ticket is a repeat ticket in last 7 days from the same customer
repeat15d: flag to know if the ticket is a repeat ticket in last 15 days from the same customer
